title: My phone just says “google play Services has stopped working”
content: My phone just says “Google Play Services has stopped” I know this is the bug that’s happening right now, but mine seems to be worsting it can’t stop even for a second I can’t even try  doing what people say that can fix it because it’s lagging and saying it so much that I can’t do a thing . I even had to make another account on a different phone to report this because my main phone  just doesn’t work.
